abstract: Photographs by Spider Martin, one of few photojournalists to document Rev Dr Martin Luther King Jr's 1965 civil rights march in Selma, Ala, are being given increased attention; Briscoe Center for American History at the University of Texas in Austin has acquired Martin's archive, and his work is being shown in exhibits in Austin, Selma and New York.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Martin, a photographer for The Birmingham News in Alabama, captured the weekslong events of Selma in 1965 and other events of the civil rights era.

headline.main: Spider Martin’s Photographs of the Selma March Get a Broader View

snippet: Mr. Martin, a photographer for The Birmingham News in Alabama, captured the weekslong events of Selma in 1965 and other events of the civil rights era.
